page.title: 18BIOGRAPHY OF A REPORTER
page.content: The Chief Reporter for the Chester Chronilcle resides in Trelawnyd. The evening paper covers the Chester - Wrexham, Holywell area. The paper which started ten years ago has gradually built up a readership of l000,000. The reporter, Mr. Emlyn Roberts, has an office in Mold, which he shares with four other reporters and three photographers. Every morniing the Office receives approximately l00 calls with news items. All these stories are considered before some are written up and taken at ll a.m. by courier to Oswestry where the paper is printed. The Sub-Editor puts the finishing touches to the sotories before the paper goes to press at 2 p.m.and on the streets by 3 p.m. Employment being the main topic, and stories are local and not national news.
